dict.string:
## Usage
Get in-line suggestions from Google’s search results via the `g` keyword ([configurable](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/)). Press <kbd>↩</kbd> to open the search results page in the default web browser.
![Google in-line results](images/about/google-search-results.png)
Set your keyword via the "Configure workflow..." button.
